title: "Contact Doesn't Exist" when clicked on in messages, but it exists in the contacts app?
content: I've been using messages and trying to use the shortcut to see the contact by hitting the circle icon. I get an error message that says "contact doesn't exist" despite the contact appearing in contacts and being searchable... Import glitch? Does anyone have a fix? I've tried restarting the phone and the related apps. Happens only for some contacts. I made sure that contacts permissions we're on for Google messages.
